Major_Arcs.title: Early Comic Strips: King Guz and Bronto
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces King Guz and Alley Oop in separate, initial storylines, establishing their characters and typical humorous situations.

sub_scenes.title: King Guz's Drowning Deception
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts King Guz's staged drowning and the subsequent confrontation about a debt, revealing his deceptive nature.

sub_scenes.title: Bronto's Tree-Bumping and Diagnosis
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Bronto's strange behavior of bumping into trees and Alley Oop's attempt to find an explanation.

sub_scenes.title: Considering a New Dinosaur
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets up the idea of Alley Oop trading in Bronto, leading to a visit to a dinosaur dealership.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinosaur Purchase and Farewell
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers Alley Oop's decision to trade in Bronto, the purchase of a new dinosaur, and the sentimental farewell to his old companion.

sub_scenes.title: Test Drive and Deal Closing
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the test drive of the new dinosaur, a mishap, and the surprisingly quick closing of the deal.

narrative_arcs.title: Considering Dinosaur Size and Taking a Test Drive
Test Drive Mishap and Securing the Deal

sub_scenes.title: Sentimental Farewell to Bronto
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene highlights Bronto's sad reaction to being traded and the subsequent farewell from Alley Oop.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinosaur Sales and Mistaken Identity
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features a new dinosaur sales attempt and a humorous twist involving mistaken identity and a familiar roar.

sub_scenes.title: Faulty Dinosaur Sales Pitch and Test Ride
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a caveman trying to sell a dinosaur with a bumpy ride, leading to a mishap during the test ride.

sub_scenes.title: Identity Revelation through Roar
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene resolves the test ride mishap with a surprising identity reveal based on a distinctive roar.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinny's Mistreatment and Chase
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc portrays Dinny's mistreatment by a caveman, his escape, and the ensuing chase involving children.

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Harassment and Dominance Assertion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Dinny being mistreated by a club-wielding caveman, highlighting the caveman's aggression.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Escape and the Village Chase
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Dinny's escape from the mistreatment and the villagers, including children, preparing for a chase.

Major_Arcs.title: Relationship Conflict and Rock Fall
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers on a relationship conflict between Alley and Cooola, culminating in a sudden and mysterious rock fall.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Invitation and Rejection Leading to Argument
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene begins with Alley inviting Cooola fishing, leading to rejection and an argument about being taken for granted.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusation of Being Taken for Granted

sub_scenes.title: Sudden Rock Fall and Cooola's Dismissal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the conflict with a surprising rock fall and Cooola's seemingly final dismissal of Alley.

Major_Arcs.title: Fishing Noise Complaint and Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc is a short, humorous episode about noise disrupting fishing and its eventual resolution through social pressure.

sub_scenes.title: Initial Fishing Discontent and Noisy Baiting
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the problem of noise disrupting fishing, with a caveman complaining and another making loud noises while baiting.

narrative_arcs.title: The Noisy Baiting and Fishing Disturbance

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Silence Achieved
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene resolves the noise problem through confrontation and a request for silence, ending with an apology.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation, Silence Request, and Woman Comparison

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Misunderstanding and Oola's Courtship
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc revolves around a romantic misunderstanding and Oola's attempt to court another man's woman.

sub_scenes.title: Suspicion of Romantic Competition
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets up the suspicion that Oola is trying to woo another man's woman, leading to an invitation to observe.

sub_scenes.title: Oola's Successful Courtship
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene confirms Oola's courtship and the woman's positive response, resolving the initial suspicion.

Major_Arcs.title: Jealousy, Romance Strategy, and Failure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details a jealous caveman's attempts to win back his 'gal' using a newly learned 'romance' strategy, which ultimately backfires humorously.

sub_scenes.title: Jealousy and Physical Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene begins with a jealous caveman attacking a redhead for being with 'his gal'.

sub_scenes.title: Learning and Attempting Romance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the concept of 'romance' as a strategy and the jealous caveman's decision to try it.

Major_Arcs.title: Finger Bite and Misunderstanding
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc is a short, humorous flashback sequence leading to a misunderstanding about a 'cannibal attack'.

sub_scenes.title: Flashback to Possessive Behavior
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene presents a flashback showing the muscular man's possessive nature and jealousy.

Major_Arcs.title: Marital Spats and Romantic Turnaround
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features multiple short scenes depicting marital conflicts and Alley's sudden shift to becoming romantic.

sub_scenes.title: Various Marital Conflicts
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene showcases several instances of marital disputes and female aggression.

sub_scenes.title: Alley's Romantic Conversion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Alley's sudden decision to become romantic and his first attempts at romantic gestures.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Men's Confusion about Women
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene provides a humorous commentary on women through the bewildered observations of two fishing men.

Major_Arcs.title: The Twitch Dance Craze and its Consequences
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc humorously explores the craze surrounding 'the twitch' dance, its dangers, and unexpected consequences.

sub_scenes.title: Injuries from 'The Twist'
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces 'the twitch' dance and its immediate negative consequences - injuries.

sub_scenes.title: Dance Lessons and Instructor Reveal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a caveman seeking dance lessons and a humorous reveal about the instructor's identity.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dance Studio and the Challenge

sub_scenes.title: Disastrous Dance Performance and Unexpected Hospitalization
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Alley Oop's humiliating dance performance and the surprising reason for hospitalizations related to it.

narrative_arcs.title: Humiliation Through Laughter During the Dance

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel to Spain and Serenade Mishap
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc involves time travel for historical research, leading to a romantic detour and a serenade gone wrong in ancient Spain.

sub_scenes.title: Time Travel Plan and Romantic Distraction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets up the time travel mission to Spain for research and reveals Alley Oop's romantic distraction in the past.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking First-Hand Information on Ancient Spain via Time Machine

sub_scenes.title: Interrupted Kiss and Time Machine Transportation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Alley Oop's persistent attempt to get a kiss and the sudden interruption due to time machine activation.

narrative_arcs.title: Persistent Kiss Request and Reluctant Agreement
Time Machine Activation and Unexpected Transportation
Arrival in the Time Machine and Explanation

sub_scenes.title: 20th Century Arrival and Spain Assignment
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts their arrival in the 20th century and Wonmug's explanation of the assignment in Spain.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in the Twentieth Century and Wonmug's Assignment
Frustration over Interrupted Kiss and Justification for Oola's Role

sub_scenes.title: Serenade and Bullfight Setup in Spain
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows their arrival back in Spain and Alley Oop's attempt to serenade a woman, which leads to intervention and sets up the bullfight plot.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in Spain and Initial Banter

Major_Arcs.title: Bullfight and Unconventional Victory
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the bullfight itself, featuring an unconventional matador and a surprising, humorous outcome.

sub_scenes.title: Bullfight Contingency and Replacement Matador
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets up the bullfight contingency due to Don Jose's injury and the unexpected selection of the muscular man as a replacement.

sub_scenes.title: Unconventional Bullfighting and Victory
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the muscular man's unconventional bullfighting style and his surprising victory.

Major_Arcs.title: Return from Spain and Romantic Jealousy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Oop's return from Spain, the promised kiss, and its disruption due to romantic jealousy.

sub_scenes.title: Anticipated Return and Kiss Promise
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets up Oop's return and the promise of a kiss for his bravery in Spain.

narrative_arcs.title: Bravery in Spain and a Kiss Promise

sub_scenes.title: Interrupted Kiss and Accusation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the promised kiss being interrupted by jealousy and accusations of infidelity in Spain.

Major_Arcs.title: King for a Day Misunderstanding
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc humorously portrays a 'King for a Day' scenario where the concept of 'respect' is drastically misinterpreted.

sub_scenes.title: Temporary Kingship and Respect Instruction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the 'King for a Day' concept and the crowned king's instruction for 'respect'.

narrative_arcs.title: King for a Day Introduction and Initial Rule

sub_scenes.title: Misinterpreted Respect and Rock Throwing
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the cavemen's ironic misinterpretation of 'respect' as throwing rocks at the temporary king.

Major_Arcs.title: King Guz's Domestic and Royal Troubles
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on King Guz's humorous domestic issues with Queen Oompa and his various royal problems.

sub_scenes.title: Bon-Bon Misunderstanding and Dirty Feet
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts King Guz's mistaken consumption of ulcer pills and his scolding for dirty feet.

narrative_arcs.title: Forced Foot Washing and Vacation Justification

sub_scenes.title: Royal Disputes and Clam Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows King Guz dealing with multiple disputes, including one over found clams, which is resolved by a wise man.

sub_scenes.title: King's Day of Troubles
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts various troubles faced by King Guz in a single day, including outdoor chaos, financial disputes, and dining displeasure.

Major_Arcs.title: Short Humorous Scenes - Apology, Rulership, Duck Measurement
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc groups together several short, humorous scenes featuring apologies, rulership offers, and a bizarre duck measurement.

sub_scenes.title: Apology and Job Dissatisfaction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts an apology for tripping and a hint of job dissatisfaction.

sub_scenes.title: Relief from Rulership and New Offer
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows a caveman happy to be rid of rulership and another being offered the position.

sub_scenes.title: Strange Duck Measurement
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene presents a bizarre scenario involving measuring 6 feet and a 'Strange Duck'.

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Prophecy and Forced Shaving
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc combines a romantic prophecy with the unexpected and humorous consequence of forced shaving.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Prophecy of Bearded Stranger
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a romantic prophecy about meeting a handsome, bearded stranger.

sub_scenes.title: Forced Shaving of the Bearded Stranger
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the sudden interruption of the romantic encounter and the forced shaving of the prophesied stranger.

Major_Arcs.title: Time Machine Mishap and Roman Soldier
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the summary with a time machine experiment gone wrong, resulting in the unexpected appearance of a Roman soldier.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Setup and Intention
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets up the time machine experiment and the intention to bring 'Oop' to the present.

sub_scenes.title: Roman Soldier and Malfunction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the time machine malfunctioning and producing a Roman soldier instead of 'Oop'.
